page.title: 03SOCIAL CONCERNS.
page.content: { {BROOK}is a very small village with an electoral roll of less than 20 people. Many families are involved in farming, both pastoral and arable. Recently though the village atmosphere has changed from its semi_feudal flavour.Many properties in the area have been bought as summer homes and by older couples for retirement.This has meant that the solid village community has been weakened.This move by summer visitors to buy property is resented by the locals. There are though still a few young families in BROOK.When the children leave school they tend to move away to find employment in areas of tourism.
